title: Best of The Program | Guests: Dave Rubin & Mary Sabbatino | 5/4/20
description:
A Newsweek article claims that the coronavirus came from a lab, and Dr. Fauci was involved. But why are our news sources so desperate to say otherwise and support China? BlazeTV host Dave Rubin joins to discuss tyranny on California beaches and his new book, “Don’t Burn This Book.” Mother of 7 Mary Sabbatino moved to Kentucky to find more freedom, only to be investigated for breaking social distancing rules and homeschooling her kids.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
